feed.title: Flink Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Flink: 0.0.1 / Sonia
entry.content:
First official public release of flink.

Features

  • 🚀 get a production-grade flink instance up and running in less then 1 minute
  • 📱 easy generation of QR Codes for shortened links
  • ⌨️ batch short link creation from your terminal (using curl, wget or any other board util)
  • 😎 swagger (OpenAPI) interface allowing you to build on top of flink
  • 🐳 deployable as container (podman and docker)
  • 📈 keep track of how often short links are visited through built-in Prometheus support

entry.title: New release for Flink: 0.1.0 / Amy
entry.content:
The flink release series continues! The second official flink release ships with a simple minimalistic UI that you can easily access from your browser for everyday usage

Changelog

  • ⬆️ bump dependencies (and mitigate CVE-2024-32028)
  • 🌐 introduce simple, sleek and minimalistic - yet elegant - Web UI for flink

entry.title: New release for Flink: 1.0.0 / Manic
entry.content:
flink has received a lot of love in the past few weeks. After extensive testing, now it is time to announce v1.0.0 - the first rock-solid version that "just works".

Changelog

  • ↕️ add support for QR code generation in different sizes (using ?height query param)
  • 🗃️ add meta data extractor (using opengraph, HTML meta tags)
  • 🌐 add HTTP API endpoint to get extracted Meta Data as JSON
  • 🪪 add link preview generator (that can be embedded as iframe)
  • 💾 support for Sqlite, MySQL/MariaDB and PostgreSQL

entry.title: New release for Flink: 2.0.0 / Silver
entry.content:
It's a while since v1.0.0 was released, many features have been implemented since then, some minor bugs were fixed. Now it's time for v2.0.0. Here's a short overview of the awesome things that went into 2.0.0

Changelog

Features

  • 🐟 spam protection using EasyList blocklists
  • 🔏 add default-theme capability to drop/remove tracking query parameters)
  • 🗑️ add ability to DELETE flinkified Links
  • 📈 add statistics page
  • 🔐 add authentication /metrics and /stats
  • ❤️ implement support for the custom themes
  • ⭕ add option to disable metrics completely
  • ✨ default-theme improvements (loading indicator for embeds, styling)
  • 👀 improve SEO for default-theme
  • 🔥 introduced Scalar API documentation
  • 3️⃣ bumped to OpenAPI 3.0
  • 9️⃣ bumped to dotnet 9
  • 🛡️ include strict CSP (Content-Security-Policy) for all themes

Others

  • 📚 documentation for hosting with docker, docker-compose, and kubernetes
  • ❤️ add list of community install guides

entry.title: New release for Flink: 2.1.0 / Knuckles
entry.content:
v2.1.0 (Codename: Knuckles) is a big release with a set of new features and lots of added benefits. Took a while to implement them, but now we're ready to launch 🚀

Changelog

Features

  • 🔐 Password protected Links
  • 🗓️ expiration time for Links (after which a Link is not accessible anymore)
  • 🗓️ activation time for Links (Link is not accessible before that point in time)
  • 📏 default theme gained the option to change the length of the short link
  • 🌐 improvements with Screen Readers (accessibility, ARIA improvements) on the Default-Theme
  • 🆔 default theme supports setting preferredId (you tell Flink which slug it should use)

Others

  • 🧮 native release builds contain checksums now
  • 🧮 native release builds for almost all platforms and CPU architectures
  • 🪟 win-x64
  • 🪟 win-x86
  • 🪟 win-arm64
  • 🍏 osx-x64
  • 🍏 osx-arm64
  • 🐧 linux-x64
  • 🐧 linux-musl-x64
  • 🐧 linux-musl-arm64
  • 🐧 linux-arm
  • 🐧 linux-arm64
  • 🐋 support for ARM Docker Container builds (multi-arch manifests)
